Field.Value: Hey Karen, it's Tommy, your former brother-in-law. | Katie here wishes you a happy birthday too... | I'd pass the phone to her but she's a little... | tied up at the moment. | If you ever want to see her again you'll do exactly as I say. | Meet me tonight at [em1]888 Brannen Street[/em1]. | And don't try anything unless you want to become an only child. | See ya soon, kiddo. | *Click*
